# GET /v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments/{id} | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments/{id} ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments-_id_)

-  GET /v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments/{id} 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments/{id}

App Store Connect API 1.7+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments-_id_#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments/{id}
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments-_id_#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments-_id_#query-parameters)

`fields[appStoreVersionExperimentTreatmentLocalizations]``[string]`

 Possible Values: `locale, appStoreVersionExperimentTreatment, appScreenshotSets, appPreviewSets``fields[appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments]``[string]`

 Possible Values: `name, appIcon, appIconName, promotedDate, appStoreVersionExperiment, appStoreVersionExperimentV2, appStoreVersionExperimentTreatmentLocalizations``include``[string]`

 Possible Values: `appStoreVersionExperiment, appStoreVersionExperimentV2, appStoreVersionExperimentTreatmentLocalizations``limit[appStoreVersionExperimentTreatmentLocalizations]``integer`

 Maximum: `50`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments-_id_#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppStoreVersionExperimentTreatmentResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appstoreversionexperimenttreatmentresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`` Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments-_id_#see-also)

### [Endpoints](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments-_id_#Endpoints)

[`List All Treatments for an App Store Experiment`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v2-appstoreversionexperiments-_id_-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments)Get a list of all treatments for a specific App Store version experiment.[`GET /v2/appStoreVersionExperiments/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v2-appstoreversionexperiments-_id_-relationships-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments)[`GET /v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments/{id}/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatmentLocalizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments-_id_-appstoreversionexperimenttreatmentlocalizations)[`GET /v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatmentLocalizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments-_id_-relationships-appstoreversionexperimenttreatmentlocalizations)[`Modify an App Store version experiement treatment`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments-_id_)Update the name and app icon name for a specific App Store version experiment.[`POST /v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments)[`Delete a Treatment for an App Store Version Experiment`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments-_id_)Delete metadata that you configured for an App Store Version experiment.
